EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}remind 1d12h [Reminder message]** ~ Create a reminder to send yourself.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}remind 5m 1d [Reminder message]** ~ Create a recurring reminder every day starting in 5 minutes.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: If the second arg is also formatted like a time, it will be made into a recurring event at that interval.
CREATED: {{mention}}, I will remind you about this when it is time!
